page.title: 05FARMS AND CROPS.
page.content: {FARMING, GRT CANFIELD. {List of farms. } There are 9 old established farms in this area, some dating back to 16C. All farms are owner occupied except Broomshawbury. Hatfield Regis Grange, N. Pratt,250 ac Deal Tree Farm, R.Turner 142 acres. Fitzjohns Fm, J.Trevelyan,233 acres. Marsh Farm, R.Knight, 395 acres. Bury Farm, R.& J.Clarke, 292 acres. Crabbs Green l32 acres. Broomshawbury 442 acres New Hall Fm,Stevensons 260 acres High Rodingbury, 2333 hectares. {Crops}mainly arable, wheat, barley, oats, sugar beet, oil seed rape, potatoes, peas , beans, and a small amount of animal husbandry. There is one specialist farm for mushroom growing, see page 7 Grt Canfield.
